messages.title: This election is a choice
messages.content: This election is a choice between a Labour government fighting for fairness and the NHS, or five more years of the Conservatives. Only a vote for Labour's Jim Fitzpatrick can help bring change. Will you make your vote count?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Saving our NHS by investing in the extra staff it so badly needs, creating better opportunities for the next generation, and cutting taxes for 24 million hardworking people through a lower 10p starting rate of tax

issues.economy: Labour has a better plan for a better future: saving our NHS, creating better opportunities for the next generation, and cutting taxes for 24 million hardworking people through a lower 10p starting rate of tax.
issues.health: This election is a choice between a Labour government fighting for fairness and the NHS, or five more years of the Conservatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP since 1997 I have stood up for Poplar and Limehouse and have worked hard for local people. If re-elected I will continue to fight for Poplar and Limehouse and keep my promises to you.

politicalExperience.achievements: Standing up for Poplar and Limehouse and working hard for local people

endorsements.endorsement: Jim has been a constant and effective advocate for the Isle of Dogs, pushing for better infrastructure and public services for local people. We couldn't be more representative in Parliament.
Jim has local people like no other hardest. Jim has a heart across all of communities and support.
Jim Fitzpatrick's commitment to education and opportunities for young people is second to none, we need Jim re-elected as our MP.
